“Hey, {Cloud}.
Let me hop on sometime.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // “Sir, you can't do that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “I'm sorry, but
this is for authorized
personnel only.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:71}); // Ester
“Hey, long time no see…
How have you been?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:72}); // Ester
“There's a lot going on
in the world outside.”{PAUSE}“It's little lonely around here,
but you can't keep a jockey
from doing what he loves.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:73}); // Ester
“How 'bout it, you want to ride again?
You have your own Chocobo, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:70}); // Ester
“Do you want to ride?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // “That's how you can find out about
a Chocobo's condition.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // “Well, not as easy as you think.
It's not just a matter of
the Chocobo's strength,”{PAUSE}“but it also depends
on the jockey and
the Chocobo's personality.”{PAUSE}“If these are bad, the Chocobo may use
too much stamina.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // “Hey, see that Chocobo
on the odds sheet?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // “Hmm…
If you find out which are
the strongest, then it's easy, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // “Yeahh!
This is why I can't seem to quit.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Go---!!
Do it----!!
That's it----!!”

ops.raw: d0 97 ff dd fe 00 00 27 00 db fe 00 00

dialogStrings:
“I'm sorry, but
this is for authorized
personnel only.”

“Yeahh!
This is why I can't seem to quit.”

“You can only buy up to 3 tickets
Think before you buy.
For example, you could select half of the
Chocobos and buy 3 boxes.”

“A box is buying 3 combinations of
2 Chocobos.”{PAUSE}“For example, if you select Chocobo 1, 3, and 5,
you can purchase combinations, such as
1 - 3, 1 - 5, 3 - 5.”{PAUSE}“You can also play the limited wheel
by selecting a Chocobo.”

“Playing a 'Limited wheel' means
you select a Chocobo and use
it in all of your combinations.”{PAUSE}“For example,
if you have Chocobo 1, then you buy
1 - 2, 1 - 3, 1 - 4.”{PAUSE}“No matter how you make your bet,
you win some and you lose some.
It all comes down to skill and luck.”

“Hey, see that Chocobo
on the odds sheet?”

“That's how you can find out about
a Chocobo's condition.”

“Hmm…
If you find out which are
the strongest, then it's easy, right?”

“Well, not as easy as you think.
It's not just a matter of
the Chocobo's strength,”{PAUSE}“but it also depends
on the jockey and
the Chocobo's personality.”{PAUSE}“If these are bad, the Chocobo may use
too much stamina.”

“One usually buys tickets for the
B and C rank races, right?”
{CHOICE}Rank?
{CHOICE}Not interested

“In other words, the 'rank' is
the Chocobo's 'strength'.
A is highest and C the lowest.”

“You can buy A rank tickets if you become
a freelance Chocobo jockey.”{PAUSE}“Of course, the higher the rank,
the better your item ticket.
Hey, maybe I'll become a Chocobo jockey!?”

“You can become one if you own a Chocobo
…and have some connections.
But Chocobo's are pretty hard to catch
and I don't have any connections.”

“Welcome
Please purchase your Chocobo
tickets here.”{PAUSE}“If your ticket is a winner,
you will receive an item ticket
good for items on the panel.”{PAUSE}“Your item ticket may be exchanged for
an item or GP at the exchange counter
to the right of the entrance.”

“Welcome.
Would you like to buy some Chocobo tickets?”
{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}Explain it to me
{CHOICE}Not interested

“Registration fees are 200 gil.
Is that all right?”
{CHOICE}Yeahhh!
{CHOICE}No way!
{CHOICE}Ask how to buy

“Thank you!
1 BET is {MEM1} gil.
This is the next race.”

“You're a Chocobo jockey, right?
Which rank will you ride in?”

“This Chocobo Race is run on
a virtual course.”{PAUSE}“The natural scenery you see in
the race doesn't really exist.”{PAUSE}“You pick which Chocobo
will finish first and second here,”{PAUSE}“And then buy the appropriate tickets.”{PAUSE}“And if the ticket you purchased is a winner,
you'll receive a ticket for an item that
will be listed on the panel.”{PAUSE}“You can exchange your tickets for
items or GP at the Exchange Counter
to the right of the entrance.”

“You are allowed a maximum of 3 bets
per Chocobo ticket.”{PAUSE}“Use the Directional keys to move
the cursor on the panel and select
with {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“Press {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} to cancel,
while the cursor is
still on the panel.”{PAUSE}“With {PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE} and {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE},
you can change the Chocobo data
shown on the right.”{PAUSE}“This data is helpful when you
make your pick.”{PAUSE}“After you've made your
selections, press
{PURPLE}[START]{WHITE} to start the race.”

“You may exchange your ticket
for an item or GP.”
{CHOICE}Item please
{CHOICE}I want GP

“Your item ticket will be {MEM1} GP.
Is that all right?”
{CHOICE}Yeah, gimme GP
{CHOICE}No, I'll take the item

“You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.”

Ester
“Hey, long time no see…
How have you been?”

Ester
“There's a lot going on
in the world outside.”{PAUSE}“It's little lonely around here,
but you can't keep a jockey
from doing what he loves.”

Ester
“How 'bout it, you want to ride again?
You have your own Chocobo, right?”

“Yeahh,
but jockeys can't buy tickets.”{PAUSE}“If you win, you'll get an item
ticket, so try it!”

{CHOICE}Let me register
{CHOICE}Tell me how to ride it
{CHOICE}Don't do it

Ester
“Hmm, it seems that no
Chocobos can be registered…”

Ester
“And your Chocobo moved up a rank.”

Ester
“From the next race,
that Chocobo will be in B rank.”

Ester
“From the next race,
that Chocobo will be in A rank.”

Ester
“Wow!
From the next race,
that Chocobo will be in S rank.”

Ester
“Wow, that's great.”{PAUSE}“Looks like you don't have any rivals in
the A rank anymore.”{PAUSE}“But you know,
there's a rank that's
full of those Chocobos.”{PAUSE}“Ahem!!
From the next race,
that Chocobo is…”{PAUSE}“S rank!
Joe's usually in that group, too.
So good luck.”

Ester
“Amazing…”{PAUSE}“This is the winningest
jockey in S rank
ever since Joe.”{PAUSE}“Good job.
Here's a little something
from me!”

Ester
“I'll register
this C rank Chocobo.”

Ester
“Then I'll register
this B rank Chocobo.”

Ester
“Then I'll register
this A rank Chocobo.”

Ester
“Then I'll register
this S rank Chocobo.”

{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}I changed my mind, don't do it

Ester
“Which do you want, the long course
or the short one?”

{Tifa}
“Hey, {Cloud}.
Let me ride once in a while.”

Ester
“Oh, you forgot?
It's all right.
Ahem!”{PAUSE}“First use {PURPLE}[ASSIST]{WHITE}
to choose either AUTO or MANUAL.”{PAUSE}“This lets you control the Chocobo
yourself or let it run on its own.”{PAUSE}“But it's pretty hard to make the
Chocobo run the way you want it to.
If the Chocobo doesn't like you,
it won't listen.”{PAUSE}“Then, you're stuck…”{PAUSE}“But, most of the Chocobos
I have are mellow
and you should be able to
handle them.”{PAUSE}“When you're riding,
use {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to Speed Up
and {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}to Slow Down.”{PAUSE}“If you go faster than
the Chocobo can handle, it will
quickly lose its stamina.”{PAUSE}“Use the Directional button to
move the Chocobo left and right,
use {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
to get a boost of speed.”{PAUSE}“But this makes your stamina
run out faster.”{PAUSE}“Some Chocobos are bad-tempered
and can't pace themselves.
They'll lose their
stamina quickly.”{PAUSE}“Those Chocobos should be
set on Manual
to slow them down.”{PAUSE}“Finally, some advice
for the restless, once
the first and second Chocobo
cross the goal line,”{PAUSE}“Push {PURPLE}[STA
